About the Company: Udaipur Cement Works Limited, (formerly known as `J.K. Udaipur Udyog Limited` ) was incorporated as a Public Limited Company on 15th March 1993 having registered office at Jaipur, Rajasthan. The name of the Company was subsequently changed to its present name w.e.f. 19th May 2006. The Company is presently engaged in the business of manufacture and sale of cement. The Equity Shares of the Company are listed on Bombay Stock Exchange Limited, Delhi Stock Exchange Association Limited, Jaipur Stock Exchange Limited and Ahmedabad Stock Exchange Limited.
